Class ShadowGuide

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class ShadowGuide
extends objectdraw.ActiveObject

This is the first oval in the shadow "chain" of ovals. This oval moves, thereby causing all the other circles down the chain to move with it.
